message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with a price of $14,000, which I believe reflects the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $12,500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $11,000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $13,000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for you.

I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still not willing to pay $13,000. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I'm not willing to go any lower than $13,000, Bob. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a 2-year warranty and a free maintenance package, which will save you money in the long run. I'm sticking with my price of $13,000, but I think the added value is worth considering.

I appreciate the added value you're offering, but I'm still not willing to pay $13,000. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product, and I think that's a fair price considering the extras you're including.
